extendedInfo.description: Become a safer driver and prepare for your theory test using your Android device!The Theory Test for Car Drivers application by the BSM enables you to prepare for your theory test by allowing you to practice the official Driving Standards Agency (DSA) questions and even take a test which is designed to be just like the real test situation! We don't just give you a sample of questions we give you the option to see ALL of the questions, by category. That way you will get to see the questions that you will get on your actual test!  Now that may sound like cheating but we want you to be safest driver you can be and learn as much as you can about driving safely and the Highway Code.Features include âEasy to use interface with your progress displayed and test time left. If you stop the test you can continue where you left off ...or start a new test.Full DSA question bank - of over 970 of the latest official DSA questions. Including all categories from the official test!Practice questions â Choose in increments of 10 the amount of questions youâd like to practice on, so if youâre in a hurry you can always do a few at a time before being ready to try test mode!Revise all questions â The entire official question bank of questions presented to you by category ...so no surprise questions!An explanation of the answer is shown if you get the answer wrong.Scoring â At the end of each test you are given a percentage score and will know if itâs enough for you to pass or fail.Test Mode â Designed to mimic the actual  test conditions â 50 questions in 50 minutes! Timed so you know how long itâs taken to complete and scored so you know what your pass rate is!Your best and worst category is displayed at the end of the test so you know where to concentrate your revision learning on.Large Images â Making them easier to see on the Android screen!Settings â You can change whether you select 'next' or move to next question automatically.      -You can also change if you are alerted to the correct answer.      -You can select in increments of 10 (up to 60) how many practice questions you are shownAt the end of all tests you can view all the questions you took, see which you got right and which you got wrong, and see an explanation for the correct answer.Itâs the very best way to prepare for your theory test!  - as recommended by 97% of Driving Instructors!*Please see our website for details (http://www.abellearning.com)Crown copyright material reproduced under licence from the Driving Standards Agency which does not accept any responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.

reviews.title: Need an improvement
reviews.comment: Not a bad app but still needs a lot of work. In most of the questions the picture appears very tiny or doesn\'t show at all and it keep crashing . I pass my theory test yesterday after preparing with it.
reviews.author: Kanu Kenneth Chukwuka

reviews.title: AWESOME!
reviews.comment: Passed my theory test yesterday with 47/50 this app is great its useful to use on the train or on the bus rather than carrying a big old book
reviews.author: Jordan Ako

reviews.title: Fantastic, wouldn\'t have passed without it
Actually useful
reviews.comment: Questions were worded exactly like they were on the test. Passed my theory today, not sure what to do with it now but it certainly helped...
reviews.author: Saul Mackie

reviews.title: Very, VERY poor show BSM!
reviews.comment: Why did I not check the reviews before I purchased?  I\'m using a galaxy s3. The app is progressively sluggish the more you use it. Frequently it does not display images for questions and when it does, clicking the thumbnail often just blows up a small segment of the image instead of displaying the whole scene.   Reviewing incorrectly answered questions is a nightmare also as the app grinds to a near holt, i\'m not sure how you are supposed to learn from your mistakes?!  Also, often there are only 2 multiple options for a question when there should be four.   Finally Its almost impossible to scroll through any lists to try and get the info you need.   I am very disappointed and worst of all I am not sure how to get my money back. Worse still actually, I think it may give wrong answers as being correct on occasion. How did this app get signed off?  I suppose most people will give up chasing a refund for the sake of two quid so well done BSM, line your pockets.. No need to invest in development. I thought you were supposed to be the learning standard but instead you have delivered almost completely unusable tat!  My advice? Don\'t be swayed by any positive ratings for this product.
reviews.author: Zsa Zsa Noir

reviews.title: Yay!
reviews.comment: Just passed my theory! This was such a great help. Just went through all the questions on the bus to and from college for a week! A lot better than on a computer. There were a few bugs but it was worth it. It crashed a few times but I just had to restart it through task manager on my galaxy ace 2. Definitely worth it guys :-D
reviews.author: ILike DeadKittens

reviews.title: not a very good app!
reviews.comment: on a few occasions it doesnt show the correct answer as an option. instead gives you 2 wrong answers to choose from.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Big 0
reviews.comment: Can\'t believe this is for sale it\'s unusable how can you answer questions u can\'t see.. I want my money back
reviews.author: Roshane Simmonds

reviews.title: Not formatted for hi-res screens
reviews.comment: Works ok most of the time, except when it gives you four choices from four possible roadsign choices, it only shows two! Other wise, very good.  GS3 4.1.2
reviews.author: Liam Salisbury

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: \302\2431.99 to buy this app which gives incorrect answers!! Do not buy this unless you want to fail your theory!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless.
reviews.comment: Within the first ten questions I had two which came up as incorrect regardless of which answer was chosen and two which began \'when approaching this sign\'....but showed only a blank screen. I went with this as had bsm all over it - how wrong i was. One star only because I have to rate it to submit the review.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish!
reviews.comment: This app keeps crashing on start up, and won\'t run... Don\'t buy this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Helped me get 49/50 om my theory test. Cannot fault it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Passed first time!!!!!
reviews.comment: This app does have a few little glitches but on the whole it\'s great I passed my theory test first time with 47 out of 50 and I did it all with this app within 3 weeks brilliant :-)
reviews.author: Steph Loughnane

reviews.title: fabbb
reviews.comment: I past my theory with this app, had 49 out of 50. its so handy being on the phone as you can practise where ever and when ever. 10 out of 10,
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sgs3
reviews.comment: It was a good app to start with until it was updated then half of the sign question pictures dissapeared. Not good
reviews.author: T Reilly

reviews.title: Incomplete
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t have all the pictures to the questions. Asks what the sign means and doesn\'t display the sign. Waste of money.
reviews.author: scott berwick

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: App force closed as soon as I open it...
reviews.author: A Google User
